meanings.sent1: She footslogs home after a long day at work.
meanings.sent2: The tired hiker footslogs up the steep mountain trail.
meanings.sent3: The sloth footslogs through the forest, taking its time to enjoy the scenery.
meanings.sent4: Time footslogs along, dragging its feet like a tired traveler.
meanings.sent5: The old man footslogs through the memories of his youth, each step heavy with nostalgia.

meanings.definition: A person who walks slowly and wearily.
meanings.sent1: The footslogs trudged along the path, their pace steady but slow.
meanings.sent2: The footslogs gathered at the end of the race, exhausted but proud.
meanings.sent3: The footslogs in the marathon joked about starting a snail racing team instead.
meanings.sent4: Among the bustling crowd, the footslogs moved at their own unhurried rhythm.
meanings.sent5: In the quiet town, the footslogs were a familiar sight, always taking their time to get anywhere.
